title: Top picks: Prime Day MacBook dock and charger deals from Anker
description: Prime Day Anker deals on laptop chargers, power banks and docks are pretty sweet. We pick some of the very best options. (via Cult of Mac - Your source for the latest Apple news, rumors, analysis, reviews, how-tos and deals.)
author: David Snow
excerpt: Prime Day Anker deals on laptop chargers, power banks and docks are pretty sweet. We pick some of the very best options.
text: Deals The Anker Prime Docking Station is a formidable tool for your laptop charging and connectivity needs. Photo: Anker Anker’s a top accessories maker for Apple users — maybe most of all for charging needs related to MacBooks and other devices. As usual, Anker Prime Day sale items could fill a dense catalogue. So we thought we’d put together some top picks for MacBook users. Namely, a choice multiport charger with solid wattage, a great portable power bank with retractable cables and a highly functional docking station with fast transfer speeds and ample connectivity. Check them out below. This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items. Anker’s a big favorite for charging needs, and this Amazon Prime Day doesn’t disappoint on related deals. See our top picks below. Our pick: Charger Anker 140W Laptop Charger with four ports and display — $100 $69.99 Display window Anker Charger (140W) This 140-watt USB-C advanced GaN power adapter for laptops and more features 4-port fast charging and intuitive touch controls. Compatible with MacBook, iPhone 16 Series, Samsung, Pixel and more. Pros:Informative displayDownward-facing ports keep cables secureUseful touch controls Cons:Some chargers offer even more power Fast GaN charging for four devices. Dual high-speed USB-C ports for MacBook charging, each offering a maximum output of 140W. Advanced ActiveShield 2.0 system monitors device temperatures over 3 million times a day for enhanced safety. High-definition color display provides detailed view of the charging status, temperature and port details. Comes with charger, 5-foot 240W USB-C to USB-C cable, user manual and 18-month warranty. Buy from: Amazon Our pick: Power bank Anker 25,000mAh Laptop Power Bank with retractable cables — $135 $94.49 Retractable cable Anker 25K Power Bank Anker's power bank for laptops and more is a 25,000mAh portable charger with triple 100W USB-C ports for multi-device charging, with built-in and retractable cables. Great for iPhone 16/15 Series, MacBook, Samsung and more. Pros:Fixed and retractable USB-C cablesLarge battery capacityPortable Cons:USB-A port just takes up space for some Triple 100W USB-C ports for multi-device charging of MacBooks and more. Charge four devices at once with dual USB-C cables, a USB-A port and a USB-C port. 25,000mAh battery capacity for long-haul charging with 100W ultra-fast recharging to fuel power bank to 30% in just 20 minutes. This 90Wh power bank complies with airline carry-on regulations for batteries under 100Wh and must be placed in carry-on baggage. Dual built-in cables, one extendable up to 2.3 ft for over 20,000 retractions, and another at 0.98 ft that acts as a durable carrying strap. Comes with power bank, protective pouch, user manual and 18-month warranty. Buy from: Amazon Our pick: Docking station Anker Prime Docking Station with Thunderbolt 4, 14 ports and 160W max output — $269.99 $169.99 14 ports Anker Prime Docking Station Bristling with 14 ports, this Thunderbolt 4 dock puts out a max of 160 watts. It offers 10Gbps fast data transfer, a real-time smart interface, dual 4K display support and audio and Ethernet ports. Pros:14 ports for many devicesFast data transfer speedsDual 4K display supportSmart interface Cons:Anker already offers a faster Thunderbolt 5 dock 14-in-1 connectivity for charging, transferring data quickl and managing dual displays. 160W of total output, capable of charging up to four devices simultaneously through three USB-C ports at 100W max each and one USB-A port at 12W max. Manage data across multiple devices with versatile ports offering speeds up to 10Gbps, complemented by dual 4K display and audio options. Connect to the dual HDMI ports to enjoy streaming or mirroring across 2 displays at up to 2K@60Hz with a DP 1.4 laptop or 1080p@60Hz with a DP 1.2 laptop. Supports USB-C, USB4 and Thunderbolt connections. Comes with docking station, USB-C cable for upstream port (3.3 ft, 100W, 10Gbps) and safety sheet. Buy from: Amazon
html:
• Deals

Anker’s a top accessories maker for Apple users — maybe most of all for charging needs related to MacBooks and other devices. As usual, Anker Prime Day sale items could fill a dense catalogue. So we thought we’d put together some top picks for MacBook users. Namely, a choice multiport charger with solid wattage, a great portable power bank with retractable cables and a highly functional docking station with fast transfer speeds and ample connectivity. Check them out below.

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

Anker’s a big favorite for charging needs, and this Amazon Prime Day doesn’t disappoint on related deals. See our top picks below.

Our pick: Charger

Anker 140W Laptop Charger with four ports and display — $100 $69.99

Display window

Anker Charger (140W)

This 140-watt USB-C advanced GaN power adapter for laptops and more features 4-port fast charging and intuitive touch controls. Compatible with MacBook, iPhone 16 Series, Samsung, Pixel and more.

Pros:

  • Informative display
  • Downward-facing ports keep cables secure
  • Useful touch controls

Cons:

  • Some chargers offer even more power

  • Fast GaN charging for four devices.
  • Dual high-speed USB-C ports for MacBook charging, each offering a maximum output of 140W.
  • Advanced ActiveShield 2.0 system monitors device temperatures over 3 million times a day for enhanced safety.
  • High-definition color display provides detailed view of the charging status, temperature and port details.
  • Comes with charger, 5-foot 240W USB-C to USB-C cable, user manual and 18-month warranty.

Buy from: Amazon

Our pick: Power bank

Anker 25,000mAh Laptop Power Bank with retractable cables — $135 $94.49

Retractable cable

Anker 25K Power Bank

Anker's power bank for laptops and more is a 25,000mAh portable charger with triple 100W USB-C ports for multi-device charging, with built-in and retractable cables. Great for iPhone 16/15 Series, MacBook, Samsung and more.

Pros:

  • Fixed and retractable USB-C cables
  • Large battery capacity
  • Portable

Cons:

  • USB-A port just takes up space for some

  • Triple 100W USB-C ports for multi-device charging of MacBooks and more.
  • Charge four devices at once with dual USB-C cables, a USB-A port and a USB-C port.
  • 25,000mAh battery capacity for long-haul charging with 100W ultra-fast recharging to fuel power bank to 30% in just 20 minutes.
  • This 90Wh power bank complies with airline carry-on regulations for batteries under 100Wh and must be placed in carry-on baggage.
  • Dual built-in cables, one extendable up to 2.3 ft for over 20,000 retractions, and another at 0.98 ft that acts as a durable carrying strap.
  • Comes with power bank, protective pouch, user manual and 18-month warranty.

Buy from: Amazon

Our pick: Docking station

Anker Prime Docking Station with Thunderbolt 4, 14 ports and 160W max output — $269.99 $169.99

14 ports

Anker Prime Docking Station

Bristling with 14 ports, this Thunderbolt 4 dock puts out a max of 160 watts. It offers 10Gbps fast data transfer, a real-time smart interface, dual 4K display support and audio and Ethernet ports.

Pros:

  • 14 ports for many devices
  • Fast data transfer speeds
  • Dual 4K display support
  • Smart interface

Cons:

  • Anker already offers a faster Thunderbolt 5 dock

  • 14-in-1 connectivity for charging, transferring data quickl and managing dual displays.
  • 160W of total output, capable of charging up to four devices simultaneously through three USB-C ports at 100W max each and one USB-A port at 12W max.
  • Manage data across multiple devices with versatile ports offering speeds up to 10Gbps, complemented by dual 4K display and audio options.
  • Connect to the dual HDMI ports to enjoy streaming or mirroring across 2 displays at up to 2K@60Hz with a DP 1.4 laptop or 1080p@60Hz with a DP 1.2 laptop.
  • Supports USB-C, USB4 and Thunderbolt connections.
  • Comes with docking station, USB-C cable for upstream port (3.3 ft, 100W, 10Gbps) and safety sheet.

Buy from: Amazon
